namespace MyPersonalBlog.DataAccessService.Services
{
   public class CategoryTagService:ICategoryTagService
    {
        private readonly MyBlogDBContext _blogContex = new MyBlogDBContext();
        public IEnumerable<BlogCategory> GetCategories()
        {
            var categories = _blogContex.Categories.ToList().Select(c=> new BlogCategory
            {
                Id = c.Id,
                Name = c.Name,
                UrlSlug = c.UrlSlug

                
            }).ToList();
            
            return categories;
        }

       public IEnumerable<BlogTag> GetTags()
       {
            var tags = _blogContex.Tags.ToList().Select(c => new BlogTag()
            {
               Id = c.Id,
               Name = c.Name,
               UrlSlug = c.UrlSlug
            }).ToList();
           return tags;
       }
    }
}
